name: Hokuto no Ken 7: Seiken Retsuden Denshousha e no Michi
overview: Hokuto no Ken 7 : Seiken Retsuden Denshousha e no Michi (Fist of the North Star 7: History of the Sacred Fist - The Way of the Successor). Is a fighting game featuring characters from the Hokuto no Ken/Fist of the North Star anime/manga franchise. It's similar to the previous installment, Hokuto no Ken 6, with changes to the game mechanics and character roster. Hokuto no Ken 7 is not only the last Fist of the North Star game for the Super Famicom, but the last in Toei's numbered series.
